uk.ac.glasgow.internman.impl

Class InternManTeamW

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.glasgow.internman.impl.InternManTeamW
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InternMan

    public class InternManTeamW
extends java.lang.Object
implements InternMan
    InternMan This is our implementation of the intern management system facade. All commands are run through the UI and directed here.
    Author:
    TeamW

        Specified by:

      • getAdvertisements

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,Advertisement> getAdvertisements()
        Get a map of advertisements appropriate to the user access level. If user is a Course Coordinator this is all the adverts, published or unpublished. If user is an Employer get only advertisements submitted by this Employer. If user is a Student the map will contain only published advertisements.
        Specified by:
        getAdvertisements in interface InternMan
        Returns:
        A map of advertisements.

      • getStudents

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Student> getStudents()
        If current User is Course Coordinator get a map of all Students stored in the system, otherwise return null.
        Specified by:
        getStudents in interface InternMan
        Returns:
        Map of Students in the system, or null.

      • selectAdvertisement

        public Advertisement selectAdvertisement(java.lang.Integer index)
        Selects a specific advertisement from the system, based on user access level. Course Coordinators can see any advert, Employers can only get advertisements they submitted and Students can only get published advertisements.
        Specified by:
        selectAdvertisement in interface InternMan
        Parameters:
        index - Integer key to identify advertisement.
        Returns:
        The desired Advertisement, or null if Advertisement doesn't exit or user has wrong permissions.

      • selectRole

              java.lang.Integer roleIndex)
        Gets a role from the system.
        Specified by:
        selectRole in interface InternMan
        Parameters:
        advertisementIndex - Index of desired advertisement.
        roleIndex - Index of role.

      • selectStudent

        public Student selectStudent(java.lang.String matriculation)
        Get a specific Student from the system. Only usable by Course Coordinator.
        Specified by:
        selectStudent in interface InternMan
        Parameters:
        matriculation - Matriculation number of desired Student as a String.
        Returns:
        Student object, or null if current user not a Course Coordinator.

      • publishAdvertisement

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

      • createNewSelfSourcedRole

        public Role createNewSelfSourcedRole(java.lang.String title,
                            java.lang.String location,
                            java.util.Date start,
                            java.util.Date end,
                            java.lang.String description,
                            java.lang.Double salary)
        Allows Student to submit a role they found themselves.
        Specified by:
        createNewSelfSourcedRole in interface InternMan
        Parameters:
        title - Title of role.
        location - Location of role.
        start - Starting date.
        end - Ending date.
        description - Description of role.
        salary - Salary offered by role.
        Returns:
        The new Role created in the system, null if user isn't a Student.
